content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Attempt to identify files through Google dorking common online clipboard sites.

Variation: Manual


Google Dorks
Below are a few search examples.
Site:pastebin.com "companyname" keywords
Site:pastey.com "companyname" keywords
site:ideone.com | site:codebeautify.org | site:codeshare.io | site:codepen.io | site:repl.it | site:justpaste.it | site:pastebin.com | site:jsfiddle.net | site:trello.com | site:friendpaste.com | site:cl1p.com | site:textsave.de | site:textsnip.com | site:txtb.in | site:shorttext.com | site:filedropper.com <domain>

Below are common online clipboards:
http://pastebin.com/
https://cipher387.github.io/pastebinsearchengines/
https://redhuntlabs.com/online-ide-search
http://www.filedropper.com/
http://FriendPaste.com
http://CopyTaste.com
http://Cl1p.net
http://ShortText.com
http://TextSave.de
http://TextSnip.com
http://TxtB.in
http://jsfiddle.net/

An online tool to search a number of paste sites at once is located here:
https://netbootcamp.org/pastesearch.html#gsc.tab=0

Finding Additional Online Clipboards
If you are able to get the blocklists from a web proxy, then you may be able to filter for common online clipboards that are on that list. If you get one of those blocklists please reference it here.

Other references


https://posts.specterops.io/being-a-good-domain-shepherd-57754edd955f
https://blog.netspi.com/adding-web-content-filter-exceptions-for-phishing-success/
https://github.com/jarun/googler

masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure that passwords and other sensitive data are not accessible to unauthenticated internet users via publicly accessible clipboards.
masterFinding.name: Sensitive Information Disclosure - Online Clipboards
masterFinding.businessImpact: An attacker with access to cleartext credentials or secrets could potentially use them to gain unauthorized access to the associated systems, applications, and sensitive data.
masterFinding.description: Cleartext sensitive information like user credentials, secrets etc. were found in online clipboards.
